section.title: What's Included?
section.para:
This binary release includes:
cassandra: Contains the script that can help you to learn how Cassandra Keyspace is configured. This is not a script for database structure creation, SMSC GW will create Cassandra Keyspace itself.
docs: Contains all relevant documentation in respective subfolders.
jboss-5.1.0.GA: The core server with two profiles "default" and "simulator". The "default" profile is a clean profile where you will have to start from scratch and configure the entire SS7 Stack and SMSC Gateway. The "simulator" profile is a pre-configured profile to work with jss7- and smpp- simulators. Refer to the Admin Guide for instructions on how to start the server in either of the profiles.
resources: Contains SLEE MAP RA jars.
tools: Contains SLEE tools and jss7-simulator.

formalpara.title: Changing of set of Diameter AVP fields
formalpara.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; &THIS.VERSION; has an updated set of Diameter AVP fields for more compliance to a specification, "Recipient-Address" AVP is under a new "Recipient-Info" AVP now, so if you use this AVP you need to update your diameter application. Added AVPs: "Originator-Interface" / "Interface-Id" / "Interface-Text" (Originator's networkID and ESME names). AVP "SMSC-Address" for non-MO originated messages contains now SMSC GW GlobalTitle for networkId of a message.

section.title: Configuration Settings
section.para: You must perform post-installation configuration of the Gateway according to instructions in the &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; Admin Guide. Before using in Production, you must remember to fine-tune Memory, Database and logging settings for better performance.

warning.para: Failure to configure memory, database, logging and other settings as per the instructions in the Admin Guide may result in poor performance of the Gateway.

section.title: Documentation
section.para: When you download the binary release and extract the contents of the zip file, you will notice that the top level directory is named mobicents-smsc-<version> and within the mobicents-smsc-<version>/docs folder you will find the &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; Installation Guide and Admin Guide. For installation and usage guidance, please refer to these guides that will help you to install and configure the Gateway.
